name: Global Rubber Conference 2019 (Natural Rubber 2.0: The Game Changer)
content: The 15th Global Rubber Conference 2019 is designed as a platform to discuss commercial prospects and opportunities on the rubber market pricings and bring together the regulatory authorities and commercial players of the rubber and rubber-products. Global Rubber Conference is the pan-Asiaâ€™s premier rubber conference meant for a global audience and is dedicated to high level discussions of the market determining forces and development in the industry throughout the region and the world. This conference supports the growth of the rubber industry by delivering objective and accurate information to conference delegates and provides an excellent opportunity for everyone in the rubber community to discuss commercial prospects and opportunities and have a better idea on the market pricing of rubber.
